docs.text: VBA Best Practices Description list of best practices and tips when developing VBA Code Set Up Each VBA project should include Config Module Config Module Example Public Const VERSION = "0.1.0" Public Const NAME = "Ish Hassan" Public Const EMAIL = "ihassan@example.com" Public Const DESCRIPTION = "<what does this vba solution do>" Public Const REPO = "<repo url>" 'any other config items e.g. ADO_FEATURE_NUMBER Main Module Utils Module (optional)
